title: 715: BITCOIN IS GOING TO HIT $400K THIS CYCLE AND ETHEREUM $40K, PREDICTS MACRO GURU RAOUL PAL!!!!
description:
Real Vision CEO Raoul Pal is predicting that Bitcoin and the crypto markets will see parabolic growth in the coming months as almost every crypto chart looks coiled and ready for a big move after months of consolidation.

"I think Bitcoin somewhere north of $200K and ETH closer to $15K, but I think we finish the cycle with BTC close to $400K and ETH closer to $40K."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
